main event: A shiny metallic object was observed near Burgoon, Ohio, which appeared to change shape from a jet trail to a saucer.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in freezing weather at around 5:15 p.m.,The object was initially thought to be a vapor trail from a jet,It took the shape of a saucer as it descended,The object hovered in mid-air before disappearing, A plane flew by during the sighting, which helped distinguish the object as being smaller and moving in a different direction.
witness description: Two girls walking in the country
